nrqlQueries.query: SELECT percentile(largestContentfulPaint, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE timingName = 'largestContentfulPaint' FACET appName
SELECT percentile(firstInputDelay, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE timingName = 'firstInteraction' FACET appName
SELECT percentile(cumulativeLayoutShift, 75) FROM PageViewTiming  WHERE cumulativeLayoutShift IS NOT NULL AND timingName = 'firstContentfulPaint' FACET appName

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE largestContentfulPaint < 2.5) AS 'good (< 2.5)', percentage(count(*), WHERE largestContentfulPaint >= 2.5 and largestContentfulPaint < 4) AS 'needs improvement (>= 2.5 < 4)', percentage(count(*), WHERE largestContentfulPaint >= 4) AS 'poor (>=4)' FROM PageViewTiming WHERE timingName = 'largestContentfulPaint' FACET appName

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE firstInputDelay < 100) AS 'good (<100ms)', percentage(count(*), WHERE firstInputDelay >= 100 and firstInputDelay < 300) AS 'needs improvement (>=100 <300ms)', percentage(count(*), WHERE firstInputDelay >= 300) AS 'poor (> 300ms)' FROM PageViewTiming WHERE timingName = 'firstInteraction' since 1 week ago FACET appName

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE cumulativeLayoutShift < 0.1) AS 'good (< 0.1)', percentage(count(*), WHERE cumulativeLayoutShift >= 0.1 AND cumulativeLayoutShift < 0.25) AS 'needs improvement (>= 0.1 < 0.25)', percentage(count(*), WHERE cumulativeLayoutShift >= 0.25) AS 'poor (>=0.25)'  FROM PageViewTiming WHERE cumulativeLayoutShift IS NOT NULL AND timingName = 'firstContentfulPaint' FACET appName
SELECT percentile(firstInputDelay, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE timingName = 'firstInteraction' FACET interactionType LIMIT max
SELECT percentile(firstContentfulPaint, 75) as 'First Contentful Paint' FROM PageViewTiming FACET appName
SELECT percentile(pageHide, 75) FROM PageViewTiming FACET appName

SELECT percentile(largestContentfulPaint, 50), percentile(largestContentfulPaint, 75), percentile(largestContentfulPaint, 95), percentile(largestContentfulPaint, 99) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE timingName = 'largestContentfulPaint' FACET appName

SELECT percentile(firstInputDelay, 50), percentile(firstInputDelay, 75), percentile(firstInputDelay, 95), percentile(firstInputDelay, 99) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE timingName = 'firstInteraction' FACET appName

SELECT percentile(cumulativeLayoutShift, 50), percentile(cumulativeLayoutShift, 75), percentile(cumulativeLayoutShift, 95), percentile(cumulativeLayoutShift, 99) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE cumulativeLayoutShift IS NOT NULL AND timingName = 'firstContentfulPaint' FACET appName

widgets.title: Click to Filter to Transaction Name

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT percentile(firstContentfulPaint, 75), percentile(largestContentfulPaint, 75), percentile(firstInputDelay, 75), max(firstInputDelay), filter(percentile(cumulativeLayoutShift, 75), WHERE timingName = 'firstContentfulPaint') as 'Cumulative Layout Shift', percentile(pageHide, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE FACET appName, browserTransactionName LIMIT 50
